short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personal Toolkit with some features for devs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with our Simple Browser Extension tailored for developers and freelancers. Whether you're coding, designing, or managing projects, this extension brings added functionality right to your fingertips.

Features include:
⭐ Quick Access Tools: Instantly access commonly used developer tools and resources without leaving your browser window.
⭐Customizable Shortcuts: Tailor the extension to your workflow with customizable ⭐keyboard shortcuts for seamless navigation and productivity.
⭐Project Management Integration: Easily integrate with popular project management platforms to streamline your workflow and stay organized.
⭐Developer Friendly Utilities: From code validators to color pickers, this extension provides handy utilities to simplify your development process.
⭐Freelancer Toolkit: Access essential freelancer resources such as time trackers, invoice generators, and productivity boosters to optimize your freelance career.
⭐Download now and supercharge your browsing experience with our Simple Browser Extension for developers and freelancers!
